original: de la gnas pa'i rgyu brjod ba ni de dang zhes bya ba ste dngos po mi bden pa dang tha dad pa med pas so //
analyzed: de la gnas pa'i rgyu brjod ba ni de dang zhes bya ba ste dngos po mi bden pa dang tha dad pa med pas so //
translated: The expression of the cause of that is ‚Äúby that,‚Äù i.e., by the unreal thing, because it is not different from that.

original: rkang ba dang po 'brel pa sa lan brjod pa ni /
analyzed: rkang ba dang po 'brel pa sa lan brjod pa ni /
translated: The connection with the first half of the verse is stated in the second half.

original: rtogs bzhin du yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtogs bzhin du yang zhes bya ba'o //

original: rtogs bzhin pa rnam par rtog pa la snang ba'i rang bzhin 'di /
analyzed: rtogs bzhin pa rnam par rtog pa la snang ba'i rang bzhin 'di /
translated: This nature of the appearance of the object of the conceptualization,üîΩeven though it is realized, is not true by the nature of the realization.

analyzed: de kho na ltar bden pa ma yin no zhes bya bar ni mi 'thad do //

analyzed: ma rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis kyang 'di nyid mi bden no zhes bya ba'i tshul ci zhig yin te de ltar yin na thams cad mi bden par 'gyur te /

analyzed: ma rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis mtha' da ga mi bden pa'i phyir ro //

original: de ltar yang ma yin te /üîΩdes na rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul mi bden pa'i phyir de la gnas pa'i ldog pa mi bden @165a * //
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin te / des na rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul mi bden pa'i phyir de la gnas pa'i ldog pa mi bden @165a * //

original: par ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: par ci ltar 'gyur /

analyzed: rtogs bzhin pa bden yang slu bas mi bden pa yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni /

analyzed: de lta na 'on tha dad pa mi slu bas nyams su myong bas bden pa kho na yin no zhes lan 'debs pa ni /

translated: are established, that is, ascertained.

original: de'i phyir tshad ma ma yin pa las nges pa 'di ni 'brel ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshad ma ma yin pa las nges pa 'di ni 'brel ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this ascertainment from a non-valid cognition is not related.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba de kho na rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba de kho na rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of that‚Äù is because there is no understanding of reality.

original: tha snyad tsam zhes bya ba tsam smos pas ni tshad ma dang bral ba nyi brjod do //üîΩmi slu ba don @166a * //
analyzed: tha snyad tsam zhes bya ba tsam smos pas ni tshad ma dang bral ba nyi brjod do // mi slu ba don @166a * //
translated: The term ‚Äúmere‚Äù in ‚Äúmere convention‚Äù indicates that it is devoid of valid knowledge.

original: dam bar ma yin pa ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: dam bar ma yin pa ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it not a deceptive object?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is like this.

original: 'di nyid sbyor ba ni tha dad ces bya ba ste gang gi phyir tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa gnyi ga la mi slu ba mi 'thad pas so //
analyzed: 'di nyid sbyor ba ni tha dad ces bya ba ste gang gi phyir tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa gnyi ga la mi slu ba mi 'thad pas so //
translated: The application of this is ‚Äúdifferent,‚Äù because it is not tenable that a nondeceptive object is either different or not different.

original: mi 'thad pa nyid brjod pa ni /
analyzed: mi 'thad pa nyid brjod pa ni /
translated: The untenability of this is stated:

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is different.

original: gal te sgras bstan pa'i rdzogs bzhin pa las bsreg pa la sogs pa gzhan thob pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te sgras bstan pa'i rdzogs bzhin pa las bsreg pa la sogs pa gzhan thob pa yin na /
translated: If the state of being burned and so on is obtained from the state of being complete as it is indicated by the word ‚Äúif,‚Äù

original: de'i tshe bsreg pa la sogs pa gzhan thob pas /üîΩmed dgag gi rang bzhin slu ba med pa'am /
analyzed: de'i tshe bsreg pa la sogs pa gzhan thob pas / med dgag gi rang bzhin slu ba med pa'am /
translated: then at that time, since the state of being burned and so on is obtained,

original: ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gyis mi slu bar ci ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gyis mi slu bar ci ltar 'gyur te /
translated: how could it be nondeceptive in the sense of being an external negation or nondeceptive in the sense of being an internal negation?

original: mi 'gyur ba kho na'o //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba kho na'o //
translated: It could not be!

original: 'on te rtogs bzhin pa las thob par bya ba tha mi dad na /
analyzed: 'on te rtogs bzhin pa las thob par bya ba tha mi dad na /
translated: But if the object to be obtained is not different from the state of being cognized,

original: de lta yin na thob par bya ba nge yang rtogs bzhin pa nyid bzhin du rtogs pas so //
analyzed: de lta yin na thob par bya ba nge yang rtogs bzhin pa nyid bzhin du rtogs pas so //
translated: If that were so, then the object of attainment would be just like that which is being realized.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni thob par bya ba rtogs bzhin pa dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir slu ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni thob par bya ba rtogs bzhin pa dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir slu ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because the object of attainment is not different from that which is being realized, it is not deceptive.

original: shes pa skyes pa'i dus nyid na mi slu ba yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes pa skyes pa'i dus nyid na mi slu ba yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: At the very time that cognition arises, nondeception exists.

original: des na slu ba'i dogs pa med pas na 'jug par bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na slu ba'i dogs pa med pas na 'jug par bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, since there is no fear of deception, it is not something to engage.

original: des na don dam par na /
analyzed: des na don dam par na /
translated: Therefore, in reality,

original: mngon sum gyi rjes las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang sgra dag kyang mi slu ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi rjes las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang sgra dag kyang mi slu ba ma yin no //
translated: conceptual thought and words that arise after perception are also not nondeceptive.

original: spyi'i yul la sogs pa med pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i yul la sogs pa med pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object of a universal and so on does not exist.

original: ci ltar ngag rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar ngag rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can yin zhe na /
translated: How can speech have the result of exclusion?

original: kho na'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: kho na'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Only.

original: gang gi phyir kho na'i sgra sbyar bar ma zad kyi ma sbyar ba yang tshig rnams kyis te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir kho na'i sgra sbyar bar ma zad kyi ma sbyar ba yang tshig rnams kyis te /
translated: Not only is the word only applied, but also the words do not apply.

original: ngag rnams su ma zad par rnam par gcod pa rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: ngag rnams su ma zad par rnam par gcod pa rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: not only in the statements, but also in the understanding.

original: gzhan gyis 'di ni re zhig gzhag go zhes smras te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis 'di ni re zhig gzhag go zhes smras te /
translated: The opponent says, This is set aside for the time being.

original: rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can 'di'o //
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can 'di'o //
translated: This is the result of the exclusion.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba rnam pa gsum du mthong ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba rnam pa gsum du mthong ba'o //
translated: In this way, means seeing in three ways.

original: grub pa'i mtha' pas nag pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' pas nag pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The philosopher says, black.

original: rnam par phye nas mthong ba nyid do zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: rnam par phye nas mthong ba nyid do zhes sbyar ro //
translated: It is just the seeing of the distinction.

original: rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa brjod pa ni khyad par dang nges par bzung na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa brjod pa ni khyad par dang nges par bzung na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The expression of the distinguished aspect is if there is a distinction, a specification, and so on.

original: gang gi tshe rnam par dbye ba 'dir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rnam par dbye ba 'dir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: When does this distinction occur?

original: khyad par dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is if there is a distinction.

original: ci ltar khyad par la sogs pa la sbyor zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar khyad par la sogs pa la sbyor zhe na /
translated: How is it applied to the distinction, and so on?

original: nag pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nag pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is black.

original: dogs pa ni sbyar ba med par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dogs pa ni sbyar ba med par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The doubt is expressed as if there is no application.

original: lan ni skabs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: lan ni skabs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The answer is in the context, and so on.

original: 'di yang rting bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di yang rting bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This will be explained later.

original: khyad par gzhan zhes bya ba na gtong phod pa la sogs pa rnam par gcod par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par gzhan zhes bya ba na gtong phod pa la sogs pa rnam par gcod par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The phrase in particular excludes generosity, etc.

original: des na zhes bya ba yon tan gzhan rnam par gcod par 'gyur bas so //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba yon tan gzhan rnam par gcod par 'gyur bas so //
translated: The phrase therefore means because of the exclusion of other qualities.

original: de ltar 'gyur mos snyam na /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mos snyam na /
translated: If you think that this is the case, then the response is that is not so.

original: de ltar ni zhes bya ba ste yon tan thams @166b cad rnam par gcod pa ni mi 'thad de tshad ma dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar ni zhes bya ba ste yon tan thams @166b cad rnam par gcod pa ni mi 'thad de tshad ma dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase that is not so means that the exclusion of all qualities is not tenable because it contradicts valid cognition.

original: sun 'byin pa gzhan ni mi ldan pa dang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: sun 'byin pa gzhan ni mi ldan pa dang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Another refutation is that the exclusion of non-possession is not tenable.

original: gnyi gas kyang 'ga' zhig 'gog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi gas kyang 'ga' zhig 'gog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Both of these are not tenable because they exclude something.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the statement that excludes what is not connected.

original: der yang zhes bya ba ni ma 'grel ba rnam par gcod pa'i ngag la yang ngo //üîΩnag pa la sogs pa'i don rnams la ni'o //üîΩci ltar ma 'brel pa la sogs pa'i bzlog zla yin zhe na /üîΩde nyid ces bya ba ni 'phong skyen pa nyid do //

translated: The phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.üîΩThe phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.

original: da ltar ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gtong phod pa la sogs pa rnam par gcod na'o //
analyzed: da ltar ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gtong phod pa la sogs pa rnam par gcod na'o //
translated: The phrase in that case refers to the exclusion of non-possession.

original: de ltar gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i ngag la yang zla bo rnam par gcod pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no zhes brjod pa ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i ngag la yang zla bo rnam par gcod pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no zhes brjod pa ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, in the case of a statement that excludes what is other, the exclusion of the counterpart is understood.

original: ra ma la sogs pa ni rnam par gcod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de skabs su ma bab pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ra ma la sogs pa ni rnam par gcod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de skabs su ma bab pa'i phyir te /
translated: The phrase a goat, etc. is not excluded means that it is not relevant in this context.

original: gnyis po kho na skabs su byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis po kho na skabs su byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because only the two are relevant in this context.

original: ram la sogs pa skabs su bab na ni de yang rnam par gcod do zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ram la sogs pa skabs su bab na ni de yang rnam par gcod do zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If a goat, etc. were relevant, then that would also be excluded. This will be explained.

original: skabs su yin na zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab par byas na'o //
analyzed: skabs su yin na zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab par byas na'o //
translated: If it were relevant, means if it were relevant in this context.

original: de nyid brjod pa ci zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nyid brjod pa ci zhes bya ba ni /
translated: What is that? means what is that?

original: mkhas pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gzhan no //
analyzed: mkhas pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gzhan no //
translated: It is another quality, such as being wise.

original: gal te yon tan mtha' dag rnam par gcod na /
analyzed: gal te yon tan mtha' dag rnam par gcod na /
translated: If all qualities are excluded,

original: nag pa nyid la sogs pa yang rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nag pa nyid la sogs pa yang rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro //
translated: then being black, etc. would also be excluded.

original: de ltar ni 'thad pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'thad pa yang ma yin te /
translated: This is not tenable, because

original: tshad ma dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes dogs na /
analyzed: tshad ma dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes dogs na /
translated: If you suspect that this is contradicted by a valid cognition,

original: 'khrul ba med pa spangs pa'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'khrul ba med pa spangs pa'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: [we reply:] it is the exclusion of the absence of error.

original: ci ltar 'khrul pa med pa spangs pa de ltar yon tan mtha' dag rnam par gcod pa yin no //
analyzed: ci ltar 'khrul pa med pa spangs pa de ltar yon tan mtha' dag rnam par gcod pa yin no //
translated: Just as there is the exclusion of the absence of error, there is the exclusion of all faults.

original: the tshom za ba'i skabs su bab pa'i tshul brjod pa ni /
analyzed: the tshom za ba'i skabs su bab pa'i tshul brjod pa ni /
translated: The expression of the situation in which there is doubt is

original: ci 'dra ba na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci 'dra ba na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: what kind of [exclusion]?

original: mtha' dag ces bya ba ni ra ma la sogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: mtha' dag ces bya ba ni ra ma la sogs pa yang ngo //
translated: All refers to a cow, etc.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba'o //
translated: at that time

original: de bzhin du shin tu mi srid pa rnam par gcod pa'i ngag gis kyang padma sngon po ni mi srid pa kho na'o zhes /
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu mi srid pa rnam par gcod pa'i ngag gis kyang padma sngon po ni mi srid pa kho na'o zhes /
translated: Similarly, by the statement that completely excludes the impossible, a blue lotus is completely impossible,

original: padma la sngon po dang gtan mi ldan pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir de nyid rnam par gcod par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: padma la sngon po dang gtan mi ldan pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir de nyid rnam par gcod par byed pa yin te /
translated: since the context is the complete non-possession of blueness by a lotus, that [blueness] is excluded,

original: padma'i rigs kyi phyogs gcig dang sngon po ldan par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: padma'i rigs kyi phyogs gcig dang sngon po ldan par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because one sees a part of the lotus-class as possessing blueness.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar rnam gcod rnam pa gsum yod kyi ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar rnam gcod rnam pa gsum yod kyi ;
translated: Because there are three types of exclusions:

original: rnam pa 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa dang / cig shos kho na ni ma yin pa des na /
analyzed: rnam pa 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa dang / cig shos kho na ni ma yin pa des na /
translated: the exclusion of a related aspect, the exclusion of the opposite, and the exclusion of a very unrelated object.

original: byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos dang mi ldan pa gang yin pa de rnam par gcod pas na /
analyzed: byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos dang mi ldan pa gang yin pa de rnam par gcod pas na /
translated: Since the exclusion of that which does not possess the property of being produced, etc.

original: chos can byas pa la sogs pa chos kyi khyad par yin gyi /üîΩgzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa dang / shin tu mi ldan pa @167a * //
analyzed: chos can byas pa la sogs pa chos kyi khyad par yin gyi / gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa dang / shin tu mi ldan pa @167a * //
translated: is the property of the subject, being produced, etc. is a specific property.

original: rnam par gcod pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par gcod pas ni ma yin no //
translated: The exclusion of that which possesses another property and the exclusion of a very unrelated object are not.

original: ci ltar thun mong ma yin pa kho na gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni nyes pas 'jigs pas /
analyzed: ci ltar thun mong ma yin pa kho na gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni nyes pas 'jigs pas /
translated: How is it that only the uncommon is a logical reason?üîΩFearing the fault that the exclusion of that which possesses another property would be a specific property, it is not taken as a specific property.

original: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas khyad par du ma bzung ba de bzhin du phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la ma grub pa gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i nyes pas shin tu mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pas kyang khyad par du gzung bar bya
analyzed: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas khyad par du ma bzung ba de bzhin du phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la ma grub pa gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i nyes pas shin tu mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pas kyang khyad par du gzung bar bya
translated: In the same way, fearing the fault that nonestablishment with respect to one part of the subject would be a logical reason, the exclusion of a very unrelated object is also not taken as a specific property.

original: ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not.

original: shing gi rigs ni nyal ba dang shin tu mi ldan pa rnam par gcad ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: shing gi rigs ni nyal ba dang shin tu mi ldan pa rnam par gcad ba'i phyir te /
translated: The class of trees is excluded from the class of non-sleepers,

original: phyogs gcig dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs gcig dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is endowed with one part.

original: de'i phyir ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa kho nas khyad par yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa kho nas khyad par yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is a distinction by the mere exclusion of non-connection.

original: des chos can de'i khyad par can gyi chos byas pa nyid la sogs pa rjes 'gro ba med pa zhes bya ba la /üîΩdpe la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'am /
analyzed: des chos can de'i khyad par can gyi chos byas pa nyid la sogs pa rjes 'gro ba med pa zhes bya ba la / dpe la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'am /
translated: By that, the property of the subject, such as being produced, etc., is said to be without pervasion.üîΩIt is not based on the fault of not pervading the example,

original: phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon de la brten pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon de la brten pa ma yin no //
translated: or not pervading one part of the subject.

original: thun mong ma yin pa dang phyogs kyi phyogs gcig lam grub pa'i nyes bdag la brten pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa dang phyogs kyi phyogs gcig lam grub pa'i nyes bdag la brten pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not based on the fault of not establishing the uncommon and one part of the subject. This is the meaning.

original: gang gis rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes par mi 'gyur ba /
analyzed: gang gis rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes par mi 'gyur ba /
translated: By what means would there not be the fault of not pervading?

original: ci ltar na gzhan dang ldan pa la sogs pa rnam par gcod pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar na gzhan dang ldan pa la sogs pa rnam par gcod pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that the exclusion of being endowed with other, etc. is not?

original: chos de zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: chos de zhes gsungs so //
translated: The word that refers to the property.

original: gzhan dang ni dpe'i chos can dang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan dang ni dpe'i chos can dang ngo //
translated: The other is the example subject.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni dogs pas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni dogs pas na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means ‚Äúbecause of that doubt.‚Äù

original: de zhes bya ba ni mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa bstan pas /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa bstan pas /
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù means that, by teaching the exclusion of non-possession,

original: gzhan dang ldan pa dang / gtan mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon med do zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan dang ldan pa dang / gtan mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon med do zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin bshad par bya'o //
translated: the exclusion of possession of the other and complete non-possession is not [taught]. Therefore, the fault of non-pervasion is not [committed]. This should be explained as before.

original: gal te phyogs kyi chos nyid ces brjod kyang /
analyzed: gal te phyogs kyi chos nyid ces brjod kyang /
translated: Even if one says ‚Äúthe property of the subject,‚Äù

original: ci ltar ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa nyid rtogs zhes dogs pa bzlog pa ni de ltar grags dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: ci ltar ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa nyid rtogs zhes dogs pa bzlog pa ni de ltar grags dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: how is the exclusion of non-connection understood? To remove this doubt, the commentary explains ‚Äúin that way, by common knowledge, etc.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar zhes bya pa'o /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya pa'o /
translated: ‚ÄúIn this way‚Äù is the explanation.

original: gzhan dang ldan pa ni zhes ni'i sgras gtan mi ldan pa yang bsdu'o //
analyzed: gzhan dang ldan pa ni zhes ni'i sgras gtan mi ldan pa yang bsdu'o //
translated: ‚ÄúPossession of the other‚Äù includes complete non-possession by the word ‚Äúalso.‚Äù

original: bzlog pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bzlog zla ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bzlog zla ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the opposite‚Äù means because of the absence of the opposite.

original: don 'di zhes bya ba ni ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa'o //
analyzed: don 'di zhes bya ba ni ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis meaning‚Äù is the exclusion of non-connection.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: gzhan dang zhes bya ba ste dpe'i chos can dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan dang zhes bya ba ste dpe'i chos can dang ldan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWith another‚Äù means with a property-possessor that is an example.

original: der zhes bya ba ni khyad par du'o //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni khyad par du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThere‚Äù means in a particular way.

original: de nyid la zhes bya ba ni gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: de nyid la zhes bya ba ni gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa nyid la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that very way‚Äù means in the exclusion of what is associated with another.

original: ci ltar 'gal snyam na the tshom du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ltar 'gal snyam na the tshom du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How is there a contradiction? ‚ÄúIn doubt‚Äù means

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid dpe dang ldan par grub pa kho na yin pas ci ltar gsal bar nus zhes bya ba'i don @167b to ;
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid dpe dang ldan par grub pa kho na yin pas ci ltar gsal bar nus zhes bya ba'i don @167b to ;
translated: Since the proof itself is established as associated with an example, what is the point of the expression ‚Äúhow is it possible‚Äù?

original: / grub pa ni sel ba'am bkag pa ni sgrub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: / grub pa ni sel ba'am bkag pa ni sgrub pa ma yin te /
translated: An establishment that is an exclusion or negation is not a proof,

original: bsal ba ni gtan tshigs kyi rten ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsal ba ni gtan tshigs kyi rten ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because an exclusion is not the basis of a reason.

original: bzlog pa'i zla bor ma zad kyi sgra dag kyang brjod bar 'dod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin no //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i zla bor ma zad kyi sgra dag kyang brjod bar 'dod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin no //
translated: Not only is there no counterexample, but the words also follow the desire to express.

original: 'di ga las she na de lta bu nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ga las she na de lta bu nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Where is that? ‚ÄúIn that very way‚Äù means

original: sgra dang brjod 'dod ci lta ba bzhin 'jug pa yin gyi don dang 'bral ba ci lta ba bzhin ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las shes she na /
analyzed: sgra dang brjod 'dod ci lta ba bzhin 'jug pa yin gyi don dang 'bral ba ci lta ba bzhin ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las shes she na /
translated: It is not that they engage in accordance with the desire to express, but rather that they engage in accordance with the meaning.

original: sgra ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to that is ‚ÄúSound is‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsod pa la don 'di yin te /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsod pa la don 'di yin te /
translated: The dispute beginning with ‚ÄúIf‚Ä¶‚Äù has this meaning.

original: khyad par dang lhan cig brjod pa'i nges par gzung ba yang mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa kho na byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: khyad par dang lhan cig brjod pa'i nges par gzung ba yang mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa kho na byed par 'gyur te /
translated: The ascertainment of the expression together with the distinction does not exclude the absence of a property, but rather it only excludes the presence of another.

original: dper na lha sbyin kho na'i bu zhes khyad par dang lhan cig brjod pa'i nges par gzung bas gzhan dang ldan pa kho na rnam par gcod kyi /üîΩmi ldan pa ni ma yin pa bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper na lha sbyin kho na'i bu zhes khyad par dang lhan cig brjod pa'i nges par gzung bas gzhan dang ldan pa kho na rnam par gcod kyi / mi ldan pa ni ma yin pa bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: For example, the ascertainment of the expression together with the distinction ‚ÄúDevadatta‚Äôs son alone‚Äù excludes the presence of another,üîΩbut it does not exclude the absence of a property.

original: skabs dang 'gal ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: skabs dang 'gal ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The response to that is ‚ÄúIt is contradictory to the context.‚Äù

original: sgrub par byed pa mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par ston pa'i skabs su bab pa yin pas de dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par ston pa'i skabs su bab pa yin pas de dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: The time has come to show that the means of accomplishment exists in the favorable side, and that is contradictory.üîΩThe conclusion is that there is no contradiction.

original: 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i grub pa'i mthar ni don 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i grub pa'i mthar ni don 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows:

original: sgra'i tshul gyis phyogs dang srid sgrub dag khyad par nyid du bstan kyang /
analyzed: sgra'i tshul gyis phyogs dang srid sgrub dag khyad par nyid du bstan kyang /

original: don gyis ni de nyid khyad par can kho na yin te /
analyzed: don gyis ni de nyid khyad par can kho na yin te /
translated: But by the meaning, it is just that which is special.

original: rten yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rten yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: chos dang 'phong skyen pa ni khyad par yin te brten pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos dang 'phong skyen pa ni khyad par yin te brten pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Dharma and archery are the specialities, because they are not the basis.

original: des na kho na'i sgras chos dang 'phong skyen pa gnyis dang lhan cig brjod pas ni ma 'brel ba kho na rnam par gcod pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na kho na'i sgras chos dang 'phong skyen pa gnyis dang lhan cig brjod pas ni ma 'brel ba kho na rnam par gcod pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //

original: de la ni srid sgrub la'o //
analyzed: de la ni srid sgrub la'o //
translated: In that, it is for Arjuna.

original: de ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: de ni khyad par ro //

original: dam pa'i don du zhes bya ba ni don gyi tshul gyis so ;
analyzed: dam pa'i don du zhes bya ba ni don gyi tshul gyis so ;

analyzed: ; tshul gnyis yod na 'dir gang gzung zhe na /

original: 'dir ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dir ni zhes gsungs so //

original: dngos po'i chos zhes bya ba ni dngos po ba'i tshul lo //
analyzed: dngos po'i chos zhes bya ba ni dngos po ba'i tshul lo //

analyzed: yul dang yul can gyi 'brel pa gang yin pa de ci ltar rtogs she na /

original: rjes su dpag pa'i zhes bya ba'o //üîΩ'jig rten gyi grags pa las brjod par bya pa ngang rjod par byed pa'i dngos po'am /

analyzed: gzhan dag ces bya ba yul dang yul can gyi dngos po rtogs pa yin no zhes 'brel to //

original: ci lta bur gyur pa las she na /
analyzed: ci lta bur gyur pa las she na /

original: rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid las so //üîΩ'jig rten gyi grags pa ni rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid las so // 'jig rten gyi grags pa ni rtogs pa ste /

original: rnam par rtogs pa'i shes pa la brjod la /
analyzed: rnam par rtogs pa'i shes pa la brjod la /
translated: It is said to be the cognition of discrimination.

original: de'ang rjes su @168b dpag pa yin no //
analyzed: de'ang rjes su @168b dpag pa yin no //
translated: This is also an inference.

original: gang dang gang rnam par rtog pa'i yul yin pa de dang de ni brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: gang dang gang rnam par rtog pa'i yul yin pa de dang de ni brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa yin te /
translated: Whatever is the object of conceptual differentiation is the expressed and the expresser,

original: dper na rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa'i bum pa'i don dang / bum pa'i sgra'i rnam pa dag bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa'i bum pa'i don dang / bum pa'i sgra'i rnam pa dag bzhin no //
translated: for example, the object of the word pot and the form of the pot in a conceptual differentiation.

original: rnam par gcod la dang nges par gzung ba yang rnam par rtog pa'i yul yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par gcod la dang nges par gzung ba yang rnam par rtog pa'i yul yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Exclusion and determination are also the objects of conceptual differentiation.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni khyad par bya ba dang bya ba dag gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni khyad par bya ba dang bya ba dag gzung ngo //
translated: The words ‚Äúand so on‚Äù include the action of the verb and the action of the noun.

original: khyad par la sogs pa dang lhan cig spyod pa nges par gzung ba'i don gang la yod pa'i tshig phrad dang / tshig phrad de'i don dag brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'o //

translated: The words that have the meaning of the determination of the co-existent, such as the word ‚Äúand‚Äù and so on, and the meaning of those words are the expressed and the expresser.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni 'brel bar rtogs pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni 'brel bar rtogs pa la'o //
translated: ‚Äú In that‚Äù means in the understanding of the connection.

original: de ltar zhen pa ni mi ldan gzhan dang ldan pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs par phyogs chos zhes bya ba'i bsdu ba gang yin pa de'i don de bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar zhen pa ni mi ldan gzhan dang ldan pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs par phyogs chos zhes bya ba'i bsdu ba gang yin pa de'i don de bshad pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the meaning of the compound ‚Äúproperty of the subject‚Äù in the statement ‚Äúnon-possession of that, possession of another, etc.‚Äù is explained.

original: de gang yin zhen tha dad ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: de gang yin zhen tha dad ces bya ba ste /
translated: What is that? It is ‚Äúdifference.‚Äù

original: gzhan las ldog pa dang 'brel ba rjes su 'gro ba'am /
analyzed: gzhan las ldog pa dang 'brel ba rjes su 'gro ba'am /
translated: The exclusion of another, the connection, and the pervasion,

original: gnyi ga brjod pa ni tha dad pa dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga brjod pa ni tha dad pa dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: or the statement of both is called ‚Äúdifference and connection.‚Äù

original: phyogs chos zhes drug pa'i bsdu ba can gyi dag la don rnam pa gsum slob dpon bzhed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par bshad pa mdzad pa bzhed pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs chos zhes drug pa'i bsdu ba can gyi dag la don rnam pa gsum slob dpon bzhed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par bshad pa mdzad pa bzhed pa'o //
translated: The master [DignƒÅga] asserts that the compound ‚Äúproperty of the subject‚Äù has three meanings.

original: gal te ngag 'di la don gsum yod do zhes bya ba 'di ci ltar rtogs she na /
analyzed: gal te ngag 'di la don gsum yod do zhes bya ba 'di ci ltar rtogs she na /
translated: If one asks, ‚ÄúHow is it understood that this statement has three meanings?‚Äù

original: bye brag tu zhes bya ba don du mar don gsum rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag tu zhes bya ba don du mar don gsum rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: [It is understood] because the word ‚Äúspecifically‚Äù is understood to have three meanings.

original: phyogs zhes brjod pa ni phyogs chos ma yin pa ni gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes rnam par gcod pa rtogs la /
analyzed: phyogs zhes brjod pa ni phyogs chos ma yin pa ni gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes rnam par gcod pa rtogs la /
translated: The statement ‚Äúsubject‚Äù excludes that the property of the subject is not a reason.

original: de'i chos gtan tshigs yin no zhes ni sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: de'i chos gtan tshigs yin no zhes ni sgrub par byed do //
translated: The property of that is the reason.

original: de lta yin dang gnyi ga yang rtogs so //
analyzed: de lta yin dang gnyi ga yang rtogs so //
translated: Thus, both are understood.

original: 'o na ci ltar phyogs kyi chos bstan par bya ba snyam na ;
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar phyogs kyi chos bstan par bya ba snyam na ;
translated: If that is so, then how is the property of the position to be taught?

original: ma grub pa drug rigs thigs las brjod pa dang / gsal ba gnyis dang / ma nges pa drug dang / yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs gsum ste de dag brjod pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa drug rigs thigs las brjod pa dang / gsal ba gnyis dang / ma nges pa drug dang / yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs gsum ste de dag brjod pa'i don du'o //
translated: The six unestablished reasons, the two unclear reasons, the six inconclusive reasons, and the three correct reasons are mentioned in the Drop of Logic.

original: de tsam zhig ces bya ba ni ma yin pa dang / 'gal ba dang / ma nges pa dang / yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs rnams nyid do //
analyzed: de tsam zhig ces bya ba ni ma yin pa dang / 'gal ba dang / ma nges pa dang / yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs rnams nyid do //
translated: The phrase just those refers to the unestablished, the contradictory, the inconclusive, and the correct reasons.üîΩThe phrase just those two refers to the reasons based on nature and the reasons based on effect.

analyzed: de gnyis nyid ces bya ba ni rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dag nyid ngo //
