original: mi gsal ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi gsal ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Because it is not manifest.‚Äù

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gsal ba yang gsal byed la ltos na'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gsal ba yang gsal byed la ltos na'o //
translated: If that were not so, that is, if the manifest were dependent on the manifestor,

original: de'i tshe'ang zhes bya ba ni gsal byed yod pa'i dus na yang ngo //
analyzed: de'i tshe'ang zhes bya ba ni gsal byed yod pa'i dus na yang ngo //
translated: then even at that time, that is, even at the time when the manifestor exists,

original: de'i phyir phyis kyi rtsol ba las sngar mi rtogs pa ma yin no //üîΩphyis kyis shes pas kyang mi rtogs pa mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa'i don du brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir phyis kyi rtsol ba las sngar mi rtogs pa ma yin no // phyis kyis shes pas kyang mi rtogs pa mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa'i don du brjod pa ni /
translated: it would not be manifest, and therefore it would not be manifest later through the effort of the manifestor.üîΩIn order to demonstrate that it is not tenable that it is not manifest even later, he says,

original: phyis kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyis kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEven later it would not be manifest.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de bzhin de nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin de nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Because it is just like that.‚Äù

original: 'on ste sngar rtsol ba med pa'i phyir mi dmigs so zhe na /
analyzed: 'on ste sngar rtsol ba med pa'i phyir mi dmigs so zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is not perceived because there was no prior effort,

original: sngar byung ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngar byung ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is said that it existed previously.

original: de la ni sgra la'o //
analyzed: de la ni sgra la'o //
translated: In that case, it is in regard to sound.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: phyi ma nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste phyis yod pa'i rtsol bas so //
analyzed: phyi ma nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste phyis yod pa'i rtsol bas so //
translated: Because of the subsequent effort, that is, because of the effort that exists later.

original: dogs pa ni rang gi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dogs pa ni rang gi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The doubt is in regard to itself, that is, in regard to the sound.

original: phyis kyi rtsol bas ni rang gi dus dang 'brel pa'i gsal bya gsal bar byed pa yin gyi sngar gyi dus dang 'brel pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyis kyi rtsol bas ni rang gi dus dang 'brel pa'i gsal bya gsal bar byed pa yin gyi sngar gyi dus dang 'brel pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The subsequent effort makes manifest that which is related to its own time, not that which is related to the prior time.

original: lan ni ci zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni ci zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The reply is: What?

original: sngar gyi rtsol ba de las gzhan gyis sngar gyi dus dang 'brel pa'i gsal bya gzhan rnam par gcod dam /
analyzed: sngar gyi rtsol ba de las gzhan gyis sngar gyi dus dang 'brel pa'i gsal bya gzhan rnam par gcod dam /
translated: Is that which is related to the prior time, other than that prior effort, excluded by another?

original: snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus kyis rtsol ba tha dad pa'i phyir gsal bya ba tha dad pa ni ma yin te gcig yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus kyis rtsol ba tha dad pa'i phyir gsal bya ba tha dad pa ni ma yin te gcig yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not that the manifest is different because the effort is different in the prior and subsequent times, because it is one.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: snga phyi'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snga phyi'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because of the prior and subsequent, that is, because of the prior and subsequent times.

original: gsal bya 'dzin pa'i shes pa snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus na gcig yin nam du ma yin nam de la snga ma dang phyi ma dag gis shes pa gcig yin na rtsol ba tha dad pa gsal ba rnam par 'byed par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur
analyzed: gsal bya 'dzin pa'i shes pa snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus na gcig yin nam du ma yin nam de la snga ma dang phyi ma dag gis shes pa gcig yin na rtsol ba tha dad pa gsal ba rnam par 'byed par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur
translated: If it is the same consciousness in the earlier and later times, then the different efforts do not distinguish the manifest,

original: te mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: te mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is impossible.

original: du ma yin na yang de tha dad pa kho nas tha dad par 'gyur gyi rtsol bas @178a * //
analyzed: du ma yin na yang de tha dad pa kho nas tha dad par 'gyur gyi rtsol bas @178a * //
translated: If it is not the same, then it is different just because it is different, so what is the use of effort?

original: ci bya ste don med pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: ci bya ste don med pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: Because it is pointless.

original: shes gzhan zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: shes gzhan zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is stated in the line ‚ÄúIf it is another consciousness.‚Äù

original: shes pa tha dad pa yin na'o //
analyzed: shes pa tha dad pa yin na'o //
translated: If it is a different consciousness.

original: 'on te gang gi tshe zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe sgrib pa yod pa de tshe ni gsal bar bya ba yod kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te gang gi tshe zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe sgrib pa yod pa de tshe ni gsal bar bya ba yod kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Or, if it is the case that when there is obscuration, then the manifest exists but is not observed.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bsgribs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgribs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is obscured.

original: gang gis sgra la yang de ltar 'gyur ba ci 'ga' zhig tu de de ltar mthong ba yod dam snyam na /
analyzed: gang gis sgra la yang de ltar 'gyur ba ci 'ga' zhig tu de de ltar mthong ba yod dam snyam na /
translated: But is there any instance in which sound is seen in that way?

original: mthong ngo zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: mthong ngo zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: If you say that it is seen,

original: rtsig pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtsig pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is like a wall.

original: skyes bu la sogs pa gzhan gyi rtsig pa la sogs pa gsal bar byas na'o //
analyzed: skyes bu la sogs pa gzhan gyi rtsig pa la sogs pa gsal bar byas na'o //
translated: When a wall and so on belonging to another person is illuminated.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni rtsig pas sgrib par byed pa nyid yin pa na'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni rtsig pas sgrib par byed pa nyid yin pa na'o //
translated: In that way means that a wall is an obscuring agent.

original: don la brjod pa ni sgra la'ang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don la brjod pa ni sgra la'ang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning is that sound is also like that.

original: rnam par 'grel pa ni yod kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'grel pa ni yod kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The commentary is that even though it is obscured.

original: bsgribs pas rang nyid ces bya ba ni sgrib pa yod na gsal bya'i rang gi ngo bo nyid yod par 'gyur ba yin la /
analyzed: bsgribs pas rang nyid ces bya ba ni sgrib pa yod na gsal bya'i rang gi ngo bo nyid yod par 'gyur ba yin la /
translated: If there is obscuration, the nature of the illuminated object would exist.

original: rnam pa gzhan du 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'gyur ba gzhan byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'gyur ba gzhan byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it does not change into something else, which is to say, it does not take on a different aspect.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mngon sum gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is directly perceived.

original: ma bsgribs pa'i gnas skabs na /
analyzed: ma bsgribs pa'i gnas skabs na /
translated: When it is not obscured,

original: mngon sum de'i rang bzhin ste /
analyzed: mngon sum de'i rang bzhin ste /
translated: it is directly perceived.

original: sngar gyi rnam par 'gyur par ma byas pa'i gnas skabs nyid dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar gyi rnam par 'gyur par ma byas pa'i gnas skabs nyid dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the state of the object as it was before is still observed.

original: ci ltar ma brtags par yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar ma brtags par yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that it is not examined?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú In this way‚Äù means as follows.

original: der yang ni rtsig pa la sogs pas chod pa las yang rjes su dpag pa'i bdag nyid kyi ngo shes pa nyid las rnam par 'gyur ba med par rtogs pa yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: der yang ni rtsig pa la sogs pas chod pa las yang rjes su dpag pa'i bdag nyid kyi ngo shes pa nyid las rnam par 'gyur ba med par rtogs pa yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no //
translated: Even there, when the object is obstructed by a wall, etc., recognition is by inference alone, and the object is understood as unchanged, not otherwise.

original: 'di ga las she na /üîΩ'di ltar dmigs pa med pa'ang ste /
analyzed: 'di ga las she na / 'di ltar dmigs pa med pa'ang ste /
translated: How is this known?

original: sgrib pas bar bcad pa ma dmigs pa yin yang mngon sum gyis 'gyur ba med pa ci ltar rtogs te mi rtogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: sgrib pas bar bcad pa ma dmigs pa yin yang mngon sum gyis 'gyur ba med pa ci ltar rtogs te mi rtogs pa nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú Because it is not observed‚Äù means that even when the object is not observed due to being obstructed, it is understood by perception as unchanged, not otherwise.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩgang phyir zhes bya ba ste gang gi phyir dmigs pa ldog pas ni /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / gang phyir zhes bya ba ste gang gi phyir dmigs pa ldog pas ni /
translated: Why is this?

original: bar chod pa de'i rang bzhin yod par bsgrubs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bar chod pa de'i rang bzhin yod par bsgrubs pa ma yin no //
translated: ‚Äú Because the negation of the object‚Äù means that the obstruction of the object does not prove that the object is nonexistent.

original: 'on te bsgribs pa ni gzhan gyis dmigs pa yin pas de nyid kyi de'i rang bzhin yod par sgrub par byed do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te bsgribs pa ni gzhan gyis dmigs pa yin pas de nyid kyi de'i rang bzhin yod par sgrub par byed do zhe na /
translated: But if it is obscured, it is perceived by another, and that very other establishes its existence.

original: gzhan gyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAnother‚Äù is stated.

original: de'i phyir rnam par 'gyur ba med pa nyid ni do shes pa kho na las rtogs pa yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par 'gyur ba med pa nyid ni do shes pa kho na las rtogs pa yin /
translated: Therefore, the very absence of change is understood only from recognition.

original: de ltar yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If that is so,

original: gal te zhes smos so //
analyzed: gal te zhes smos so //
translated: ‚Äúif‚Äù is stated.

original: de zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the absence of change.

original: de'i tshe log tu gyur pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ngo shes pa ni rjes su dpag pa yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe log tu gyur pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ngo shes pa ni rjes su dpag pa yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, recognition would be inference because it has a mistaken object.

original: ci lta bur gyur pa zhe na /
analyzed: ci lta bur gyur pa zhe na /
translated: What kind of recognition?

original: mngon sum gyi sngon 'gro can ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi sngon 'gro can ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not preceded by perception.

original: de lta yin mod snyam na /üîΩmngon sum sngon 'gro can min na //
analyzed: de lta yin mod snyam na / mngon sum sngon 'gro can min na //
translated: If that is so,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúif it is not preceded by perception‚Äù is stated.üîΩWhat kind of recognition?üîΩIt is not preceded by perception.

original: ci ltar long @178b ba brgyud pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar long @178b ba brgyud pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it a mistaken inference?

original: rjes su dpag pa yin na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa yin na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is inference‚Äù is stated.

original: bsgribs pa na yang yod ngo zhes rnam pa de lta bu'i bdag nyid can gyi /
analyzed: bsgribs pa na yang yod ngo zhes rnam pa de lta bu'i bdag nyid can gyi /
translated: ‚ÄúEven when it is covered‚Äù means that the nature of the object is not changed by the covering.

original: rtags gang yin pas bsgribs pa'i gnas skabs na rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin de yang ngo //
analyzed: rtags gang yin pas bsgribs pa'i gnas skabs na rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin de yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúThat nature‚Äù is the nature that is not changed when it is covered.

original: de ltar gyur pas zhes bya ba ni mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can ma yin pa /üîΩrnam par 'gyur pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyi rtags kyis 'grub phyir te /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pas zhes bya ba ni mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can ma yin pa / rnam par 'gyur pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyi rtags kyis 'grub phyir te /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of that‚Äù means that the nature that is not changed is established by the sign that is not preceded by perception.

original: nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the certainty‚Äù means that the nature that is not changed is established by the sign that is not preceded by perception.

original: dmigs pa med na'ang mngon sum gyis zhes bya ba rnam par 'grel ba ni /üîΩsgrib pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa med na'ang mngon sum gyis zhes bya ba rnam par 'grel ba ni / sgrib pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEven when the object is not perceived‚Äù is explained as ‚Äúeven when it is covered.‚Äù

original: ma bsgribs pa'i gnas skabs na /üîΩrnam par ma bsgyur ba'i rtogs pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: ma bsgribs pa'i gnas skabs na / rnam par ma bsgyur ba'i rtogs pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen it is not covered‚Äù means when it is not covered by something else.

original: phyis zhes bya ba'o//
analyzed: phyis zhes bya ba'o//
translated: The doubt that is raised about the nature that is not changed is ‚ÄúLater on.‚Äù

original: lan ni de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba ste phyis kyi tshe nyid do //
analyzed: lan ni de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba ste phyis kyi tshe nyid do //
translated: The answer is ‚ÄúAt that time,‚Äù which is the same as ‚Äúlater on.‚Äù

original: gal te do shes pa las de zhes bya ba rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: gal te do shes pa las de zhes bya ba rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is known from that‚Äù is explained as ‚Äúif it is known from the object.‚Äù

original: bar na yod pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bar na yod pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn between‚Äù means in the middle.

original: de lta yin na yang zhes bya ba ni lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can nyid yin na'o //üîΩci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de lta yin na yang zhes bya ba ni lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can nyid yin na'o // ci ltar zhe na /
translated: If it were so, means if it were to be a subject with a hidden object.üîΩHow?

original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because means for what reason.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos po la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos po la'o //
translated: There means in the case of the prior and subsequent entities.

original: ci ltar mngon sum /
analyzed: ci ltar mngon sum /
translated: How is it like perception?

original: sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa kho na'o //
translated: It is only preceded by.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: thams cad du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Everywhere means in all cases.

original: 'o na rjes su dpag pa sngon du 'gro ba can du 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na rjes su dpag pa sngon du 'gro ba can du 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: If it is thought, Then it would be preceded by inference,

original: rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba'o //üîΩrnam pa ci ltar yang rung bar mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can du dogs pa bsu bas ni /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba'o // rnam pa ci ltar yang rung bar mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can du dogs pa bsu bas ni /
translated: inference is stated.

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ste rtogs pa po gzhan gyis so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ste rtogs pa po gzhan gyis so //
translated: In order to anticipate the doubt that it is preceded by perception in some way, it is said, By another, that is, by another cognizer.

original: gal te yang rtogs pa po gcig gi dbang du byas nas bum pa la sogs pa bsgribs pa yin pa de lta na yang rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'i rtogs pa po gzhan gyis ni de rtogs pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: gal te yang rtogs pa po gcig gi dbang du byas nas bum pa la sogs pa bsgribs pa yin pa de lta na yang rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'i rtogs pa po gzhan gyis ni de rtogs pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But even if it is the case that the object, such as a pot, is obscured from the perspective of a single cognizer, it is still cognized by another cognizer who is in a suitable location.

original: gzhan gyi dmigs so zhes bya ba rnam par 'grel pas 'di la yang lan 'debs pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dmigs so zhes bya ba rnam par 'grel pas 'di la yang lan 'debs pa ni /
translated: The response to this is stated in the line ‚ÄúThe other‚Äôs observation,‚Äù which is explained as follows.

original: de la yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de la yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The line ‚ÄúIn that case, too‚Äù means

original: gzhan gyi rtogs pa la yang do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi rtogs pa la yang do //
translated: that the same problem arises for the other‚Äôs cognition.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: gzhan gyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The line ‚ÄúThe other‚Äôs‚Äù explains this.

original: dogs pa ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dogs pa ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The doubt is stated in the line ‚ÄúBut if it is said . . .‚Äù

original: lan ni de smra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: lan ni de smra ba ma yin no //
translated: The response is ‚ÄúThat is not so.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshig ces bya ba'o //
translated: The line ‚ÄúThe words‚Äù explains this.

original: 'on te bden par smra pa'i tshig la rjes su dpog pa po nges pa kho na 'o zhe na bden par smra yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te bden par smra pa'i tshig la rjes su dpog pa po nges pa kho na 'o zhe na bden par smra yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if it is said that the one who infers is certain only in regard to the words of the one who speaks truly, the response is ‚ÄúEven if he speaks truly . . .‚Äù

original: rjes su dpog pa po gzhan gyis ni /
analyzed: rjes su dpog pa po gzhan gyis ni /
translated: The other who infers

original: bdag nyid bden par smra ba nyid du yang des par nus pa ma yin na mngon du byas par nges pa lta ga la yang yin //
analyzed: bdag nyid bden par smra ba nyid du yang des par nus pa ma yin na mngon du byas par nges pa lta ga la yang yin //
translated: If it is not possible to ascertain that one is speaking the truth, how much less possible is it to ascertain that one has realized the truth?

original: yul gang la 'di bde na par smra ba zhe na /
analyzed: yul gang la 'di bde na par smra ba zhe na /
translated: With regard to what object is one speaking the truth?

original: gang zhig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba'o //
translated: With regard to what?

original: des zhes bya ba ni @179a * //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni @179a * //
translated: With that

original: mngon du byed pa'o //
analyzed: mngon du byed pa'o //
translated: means with the realization.üîΩWith that

original: des zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpog pa'o //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpog pa'o //
translated: means with the inference.

original: bden par smra bar mi nges pa yang yul ma nges pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: bden par smra bar mi nges pa yang yul ma nges pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: The statement ‚ÄúIt is not ascertained that one is speaking the truth because the object is not ascertained‚Äù is as follows.üîΩBy another

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: means by another person.üîΩIn that way

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis rtogs pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis rtogs pa nyid du'o //
translated: means in the way that another person understands.üîΩThat itself

original: de nyid ni zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rtogs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rtogs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: means whatever is understood by another.üîΩTherefore

original: des na zhes bya ba ni bden par smra ba nyid du nges pa med pas na /
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni bden par smra ba nyid du nges pa med pas na /
translated: means because it is not ascertained that one is speaking the truth.

original: dngos po la gzhan gyis rtogs pa nyid du rtogs pa med pas na'o //
analyzed: dngos po la gzhan gyis rtogs pa nyid du rtogs pa med pas na'o //
translated: Since it is not ascertained that one is speaking the truth, it is not ascertained that one understands the realization of another.

original: de rtogs na ni phan tshun brten pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rtogs na ni phan tshun brten pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were ascertained, there would be the error of mutual dependence.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: phan tshun zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: phan tshun zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The term ‚Äúeach other‚Äù is used.üîΩ

original: gcig la gcig rtogs pa nyid du brjod pas na de rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: gcig la gcig rtogs pa nyid du brjod pas na de rtogs pa yin la /
translated: ‚ÄúMutually‚Äù means that one understands the other.

original: de rtogs pas kyang de brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rtogs pas kyang de brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because one understands that, one expresses it.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba ni bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba ni bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: But the change of the face, etc., which is the expansion of the face, etc.,

original: ngal mngon sum du gyur pa'i don gyi bskyed pa yin te /üîΩdper na nga'i bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
analyzed: ngal mngon sum du gyur pa'i don gyi bskyed pa yin te / dper na nga'i bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
translated: is the production of the meaning that is directly perceived,üîΩjust as the change of my face, etc., is the expansion of the face, etc.

original: 'di'i bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba yang bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di'i bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba yang bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And the change of the face, etc., of that one is the expansion of the face, etc.

original: de nyid brjod pa ni de lta bu nyid kyi rnam par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid brjod pa ni de lta bu nyid kyi rnam par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The expression of that is the change of that kind.

original: de 'dra ba bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba mthong ba las rtogs pa po gzhan des kyang ngas mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid rtogs so //
analyzed: de 'dra ba bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba mthong ba las rtogs pa po gzhan des kyang ngas mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid rtogs so //
translated: From seeing the change of the face, etc., of that kind, the other one who understands thinks, ‚ÄúI understand just what he saw.‚Äù

original: zhes so // lan ni 'o na de lta bu nyid ces bya ba ste de dang rigs mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // lan ni 'o na de lta bu nyid ces bya ba ste de dang rigs mtshungs pa'o //
translated: The response is: ‚ÄúWell then, it is just like that,‚Äù that is, it is similar to that.

original: de ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: That is the inference.

original: ci'i phyir rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin zhe na rjes su dpag pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin zhe na rjes su dpag pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Why is it not reasonable? ‚ÄúInference‚Äù is the response.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na du ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na du ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Why? ‚ÄúBecause of smoke‚Äù is the response.

original: dpe la mthong ba de nyid do //
analyzed: dpe la mthong ba de nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThat is seen in the example‚Äù is the response.

original: 'on kyang dpe la mthong ba dang rigs mtshungs pa 'grub po //
analyzed: 'on kyang dpe la mthong ba dang rigs mtshungs pa 'grub po //
translated: However, it is established that it is similar to what is seen in the example.

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang shing la gnas pa'i bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba las nges pa'i rgyu dang rigs mtshungs pa 'grub kyi don gcig ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang shing la gnas pa'i bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba las nges pa'i rgyu dang rigs mtshungs pa 'grub kyi don gcig ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, here it is established that it is similar to the cause that is ascertained from the transformation of the face in the mirror, and so on, but it is not the same object.

original: sun 'byin pa gzhan yang brjod pa ni /
analyzed: sun 'byin pa gzhan yang brjod pa ni /
translated: Another objection is stated:

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù is the response.

original: bdag kyang ci ste gcig ma yin zhes sbyar ste /
analyzed: bdag kyang ci ste gcig ma yin zhes sbyar ste /
translated: ‚ÄúWhy is the self not also one?‚Äù is the response.

original: bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The transformation of the face in the mirror, and so on,

original: nga'i bden pa'am bdag gis byas pa yin te /
analyzed: nga'i bden pa'am bdag gis byas pa yin te /
translated: is either true for me or it is done by the self.

original: dper na nga rang gi bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nga rang gi bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, like the changes in the face, etc.

original: 'di'i bzhin 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba yang bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba yin @179b no //
analyzed: 'di'i bzhin 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba yang bzhin rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba yin @179b no //
translated: The changes in the face, etc. are also the changes in the face, etc.

original: bde ba'am bdag kyang gcig nyid du 'gyur ro //üîΩgal te mngon sum gyis gnod pa ni /
analyzed: bde ba'am bdag kyang gcig nyid du 'gyur ro // gal te mngon sum gyis gnod pa ni /
translated: And pleasure and the self would be identical.

original: phyogs sam yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: phyogs sam yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: If you think that direct perception contradicts this,

original: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: we reply:üîΩOr, if you think that the self is not the object of direct perception,üîΩwe reply:

original: de lta ba yin na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta ba yin na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If that is so,

original: bde ba la sogs pa tha dad na'o rtogs pa dag kyang zhes bya ba ni sngon po dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa tha dad na'o rtogs pa dag kyang zhes bya ba ni sngon po dag kyang ngo //
translated: then even though the cognitions of pleasure, etc. are different,üîΩthe cognitions of blue, etc. are also different.

original: lta ba po gnyis kyi mthong ba'i sngon po la gcig nyid du lhag par zhen kyang rigs pas tha dad pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lta ba po gnyis kyi mthong ba'i sngon po la gcig nyid du lhag par zhen kyang rigs pas tha dad pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though the two viewers conceive the blue that is seen to be identical, by reason it is only different.

original: 'o na ji ltar yul mtshungs par rtogs snyam na /üîΩde rtogs pa med par zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar yul mtshungs par rtogs snyam na / de rtogs pa med par zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If you think, ‚ÄúHow is the object understood to be the same?‚ÄùüîΩwe reply:üîΩWithout understanding that,

original: gnyi gas gcig rtogs pa med par ro //
analyzed: gnyi gas gcig rtogs pa med par ro //
translated: without both understanding that.

original: de rtogs pas kyang ci'i phyir yul gcig nyid ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: de rtogs pas kyang ci'i phyir yul gcig nyid ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not one object?

original: dngos po'i bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po'i bya ba'o //
translated: The activity of an entity.

original: gang gi phyir bsgribs pa'i dus na bum pa la sogs pa ci ltar yang yod par mi 'gyur ba des na bum pa la sogs pa yod kyang sgrib pa yod pas na'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bsgribs pa'i dus na bum pa la sogs pa ci ltar yang yod par mi 'gyur ba des na bum pa la sogs pa yod kyang sgrib pa yod pas na'o //
translated: Because when it is obscured, a pot, etc. would not exist in any way. Therefore, although a pot, etc. exists, it is not perceived because of the obscuration.

original: gzhan gyis rtogs pa nyid rtogs par dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyis rtogs pa nyid rtogs par dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: The objection that the existence of the object is not established is as follows:

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said that the object is not perceived because it is obscured,

original: 'on te rtogs pa //
analyzed: 'on te rtogs pa //
translated: then it is not perceived because it does not exist.

original: 'di ni gnod pa des na /
analyzed: 'di ni gnod pa des na /
translated: This is the objection.

original: tshad ma ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it is not a valid cognition because it is contradicted,

original: gnod par byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is contradicted.üîΩIf it is asked how it is contradicted,üîΩit is said that it is not the immediately preceding condition.üîΩIf it is asked how it is contradicted,üîΩit is said that it is not the immediately preceding condition.

original: gal te gnod byed brjod ma thag pa kho na ma yin nam ci ltar de med snyam na /
analyzed: gal te gnod byed brjod ma thag pa kho na ma yin nam ci ltar de med snyam na /
translated: If it is asked how it is contradicted,üîΩit is said that it is not the immediately preceding condition.üîΩIf it is asked how it is contradicted,üîΩit is said that it is not the immediately preceding condition.üîΩIf it is asked how it is contradicted,üîΩit is said that it is not the immediately preceding condition.üîΩIf it is asked how it is contradicted,üîΩit is said that it is not the immediately preceding condition.üîΩIf it is asked how it is contradicted,

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: it is said that it is not the immediately preceding condition.üîΩIf it is asked how it is contradicted,üîΩit is said that it is not the immediately preceding condition.üîΩIf it is asked how it is contradicted,üîΩit is said that it is not the immediately preceding condition.üîΩIf it is asked how it is contradicted,üîΩit is said that it is not the immediately preceding condition.üîΩIf it is asked how it is contradicted,üîΩit is said that it is not the immediately preceding condition.üîΩIf it is asked how it is contradicted,

original: gzhan gyis rtogs pa nyid rtogs so zhes rtogs pa la'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis rtogs pa nyid rtogs so zhes rtogs pa la'o //
translated: it is said that it is not the immediately preceding condition.

original: ci ltar 'jig par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'jig par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is asked how it is contradicted,üîΩit is said that it is not the immediately preceding condition.üîΩIf it is asked how it is contradicted,üîΩit is said that it is not the immediately preceding condition.üîΩIf it is asked how it is contradicted,üîΩit is said that it is not the immediately preceding condition.üîΩIf it is asked how it is contradicted,

original: zhib mor zhes bya ba ste zas la sogs pa yang mi za bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhib mor zhes bya ba ste zas la sogs pa yang mi za bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: it is said that it is not the immediately preceding condition.üîΩIf it is asked how it is contradicted,üîΩit is said that it is not

original: ci ltar de bkag pa tshad ma bkag pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar de bkag pa tshad ma bkag pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that the refutation of that is the refutation of a valid cognition?

original: zhib mor zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhib mor zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, in detail.

original: pha rol ni sangs rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol ni sangs rgyas pa'o //
translated: The other is the Buddhist.

original: gal te 'jig rten gyi tha snyad 'phel ba'i don du yin pa'i phyir don byed pa ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'jig rten gyi tha snyad 'phel ba'i don du yin pa'i phyir don byed pa ci ltar zhe na /
translated: If it is for the sake of the increase of mundane convention, what is the point of the performance of action?

original: tha snyad tsam po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha snyad tsam po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, mere convention.

original: rmongs pa 'phel ba'i don du ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las shen / a bstan bcos zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rmongs pa 'phel ba'i don du ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las shen / a bstan bcos zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How do you know that it is not for the sake of the increase of delusion? It is said, the treatise.

original: 'di nyid la dogs pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi sun 'byin pa gzhan brjod pa ni /üîΩgal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid la dogs pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi sun 'byin pa gzhan brjod pa ni / gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, anticipating the objection, he states another refutation:

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: If it is said, How?

original: spyi bor zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi bor zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, on the head.

original: gal te tha snyad rnam par dpyod pas gnod na /
analyzed: gal te tha snyad rnam par dpyod pas gnod na /
translated: If it is objected that convention is undermined by analysis,

original: de'i tshe yang rtogs pa ldan pa khas len pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang rtogs pa ldan pa khas len pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: then it is said, at that time, the wise accept it.

original: brjod pa ni mkhas pa rnams la ni zhes bya ba ste thar pa 'dod pa rnams la 'khor ba'i tha snyad 'chad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: brjod pa ni mkhas pa rnams la ni zhes bya ba ste thar pa 'dod pa rnams la 'khor ba'i tha snyad 'chad pa kho na'o //
translated: It is said, for the wise, that is, for those who desire liberation, the convention of cyclic existence is explained.

original: zhib mor rnam par dpyad kyang 'khor ba med pa dag kyang ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhib mor rnam par dpyad kyang 'khor ba med pa dag kyang ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But when one examines in detail, it is not the case that cyclic existence does not exist.

original: yang na lhag par zhen pa ci lta ba bzhin rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyi tha snyad bsgrub pa'i phyir nyams par ga la 'gyur te ci 'gal zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na lhag par zhen pa ci lta ba bzhin rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyi tha snyad bsgrub pa'i phyir nyams par ga la 'gyur te ci 'gal zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or else, how could there be a fault in establishing the conventional nature of cause and effect just as it is adhered to? What is the contradiction?

original: 'di nyid rnam par @180a * //
analyzed: 'di nyid rnam par @180a * //
translated: This is the

original: 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: 'grel pa ni /
translated: commentary on the verse:

original: tha snyad pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha snyad pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFor those who are conventionalists, there is no fault.‚Äù

original: 'o na 'di ji ltar zlog snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na 'di ji ltar zlog snyam na /
translated: But how can this be refuted?

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore,

original: tha snyad pa rnams kyi nyams pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad pa rnams kyi nyams pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because there is no fault for those who are conventionalists.

original: tha snyad 'di'i de kho na ste rang bzhin nges par brtags par zlog par byed do //
analyzed: tha snyad 'di'i de kho na ste rang bzhin nges par brtags par zlog par byed do //
translated: The reality of this conventional nature is refuted by the ascertainment of its nature.

original: gal te tha snyad ni rnam par rtog pa yin la /
analyzed: gal te tha snyad ni rnam par rtog pa yin la /
translated: If the conventional is conceptual,

original: de ni nges par rtog pa las sngar yang med pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: de ni nges par rtog pa las sngar yang med pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: and if it is not nonexistent prior to ascertainment by conception,

original: des na gang gis 'di nge par brtags pas bzlog ce na mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na gang gis 'di nge par brtags pas bzlog ce na mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, if one investigates this, what is it that is to be averted? It is for the sake of nirvana.

original: gal te tha snyad kyi de kho na nges par brtags pas zlog par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te tha snyad kyi de kho na nges par brtags pas zlog par byed pa yin na /
translated: If the reality of conventional usage is to be averted by investigation,

original: de nyid de kho na ma yin mod /
analyzed: de nyid de kho na ma yin mod /
translated: then it is not reality.

original: ci ltar na 'khor ba de kho na ma yin par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar na 'khor ba de kho na ma yin par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How could cyclic existence not be reality?

original: kun rdzob ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob ces bya ba'o //
translated: It is called ‚Äúconventional.‚Äù

original: 'khor ba de kho na ma yin na /
analyzed: 'khor ba de kho na ma yin na /
translated: If cyclic existence is not reality,

original: de kho na nyid ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin par gnas so zhes brjod pa ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin par gnas so zhes brjod pa ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then reality is said to be nirvana.

original: de lta na'o na de kho na dang de kho na ma yin pa tha dad pa'i phyir ci lta de khon gnyis med par gzhag ce na /
analyzed: de lta na'o na de kho na dang de kho na ma yin pa tha dad pa'i phyir ci lta de khon gnyis med par gzhag ce na /
translated: If that is so, then since reality and unreality are different, how can they be established as nondual?

original: de nyid de nyid min zhes bya ba ste kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bdag tha dad pa dag ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de nyid de nyid min zhes bya ba ste kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bdag tha dad pa dag ma yin gyi /
translated: It is said that ‚Äúreality is not reality,‚Äù but the afflicted and the pure are not different.

original: 'on kyang rnam par byang ba nyid sna tshogs gnyis med par rigs pa kho na yin gyi don dam par na 'khor zhes bya ba ni yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di don dam pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang rnam par byang ba nyid sna tshogs gnyis med par rigs pa kho na yin gyi don dam par na 'khor zhes bya ba ni yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di don dam pa nyid yin te /
translated: However, the purification itself is just the non-duality of the variety, and this is the ultimate itself, since it is said that ultimately there is no such thing as cyclic existence.

original: des na gnyis med pa'i de kho na gnas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na gnyis med pa'i de kho na gnas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the meaning is that the non-dual reality is the basis.

original: gal te 'khor ba zhes bya ba don dam par med pa kho na yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'khor ba zhes bya ba don dam par med pa kho na yin na /
translated: If cyclic existence does not exist ultimately,

original: 'o na ci ltar 'jig rten 'khor ba zhes mngon par rlom pa yin zhes dogs na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar 'jig rten 'khor ba zhes mngon par rlom pa yin zhes dogs na /
translated: how is it that the world is conceited with the thought ‚Äúcyclic existence‚Äù?

original: de nyid dpyad pa med pa dag kho na de kho na ma yin no zhes sems par byed //
analyzed: de nyid dpyad pa med pa dag kho na de kho na ma yin no zhes sems par byed //
translated: They think that it is not reality, since it is not analyzed.

original: ci ltar 'khor pa'i tha snyad chad par bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'khor pa'i tha snyad chad par bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: How is the convention of cyclic existence to be refuted?

original: kho na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: kho na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is just that.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byad ba dag tha dad ba de na'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byad ba dag tha dad ba de na'o //
translated: Since the defilement and purification are different,

original: ci ltar 'jig par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni ci ltar khyod the tshom za phyir 'jig par 'gyur zhes brjod /
analyzed: ci ltar 'jig par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni ci ltar khyod the tshom za phyir 'jig par 'gyur zhes brjod /
translated: How could it be destroyed, since you doubt it?

original: zhib mor dpyod pa ni rnam par dpyod pa yin la /
analyzed: zhib mor dpyod pa ni rnam par dpyod pa yin la /
translated: ‚ÄúAnalysis‚Äù is investigation.

original: de yang bsgrub par bya ba kho na ste /
analyzed: de yang bsgrub par bya ba kho na ste /
translated: And that is to be accomplished,

original: 'khor pa cha dpa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khor pa cha dpa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the cause of the cessation of cyclic existence.

original: 'o na gang gi tshe 'khor ba la gnod pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gang gi tshe 'khor ba la gnod pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: But when is cyclic existence not harmed?

original: ci srid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci srid ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAs long as‚Äù is the answer.

original: des na de kho na mthong ba las 'khor ba cad par 'gyur ba ni 'dod pa nyid thog tu bab pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de kho na mthong ba las 'khor ba cad par 'gyur ba ni 'dod pa nyid thog tu bab pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is accepted that cyclic existence ceases through seeing reality.

original: gal te de kho na mthong ba nyid las 'khor ba ldog pa yin na de'i tshe thog ma ba nyid du de kho na ci ste mi bsgrub ste /
analyzed: gal te de kho na mthong ba nyid las 'khor ba ldog pa yin na de'i tshe thog ma ba nyid du de kho na ci ste mi bsgrub ste /
translated: But if cyclic existence ceases through seeing reality, then why is reality not accomplished in the beginning?

original: mi @180b rtag pa nyid la sogs pa sgrub pa'i tha snyad kyi ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: mi @180b rtag pa nyid la sogs pa sgrub pa'i tha snyad kyi ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What is the point of the conventions of accomplishing impermanence and so on?

original: mkhas pa'i skye bo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mkhas pa'i skye bo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe wise‚Äù is the answer.

original: 'di nyid ni 'chad bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid ni 'chad bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is being explained.

original: gang la ni skad cig la'o //
analyzed: gang la ni skad cig la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn regard to what?‚Äù In regard to the moment.

original: ci ltar skad cig ma nyid bsgrub pa ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar skad cig ma nyid bsgrub pa ce na /
translated: How is momentariness established?

original: do'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: do'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //

original: gang gi tshe zhes bya ba ni brtsal la thag tu 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhes bya ba ni brtsal la thag tu 'byung ba ste /
translated: When, immediately after the effort,

original: gang zhig brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i shes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang zhig brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i shes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the cognition of that arises,

original: gang zhes bya ba ni yul gyi rang bzhin no //üîΩde'i tshe de zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gang zhes bya ba ni yul gyi rang bzhin no // de'i tshe de zhes bya ba ni /
translated: that is, the cognition of the object,üîΩat that time,

original: de'i tshe kho na de brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe kho na de brjod pa yin te /
translated: at that very time, it is said that

original: mi rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: it is not cognized.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sngon dang phyi ma'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngon dang phyi ma'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because of the prior and subsequent.

original: 'di nyid brjod pa ni gang zhig ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid brjod pa ni gang zhig ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is being said: that which is what?

original: gtan tshigs 'di la skad cig pa ma yin par smra ba gzhan dag ma nges pa nyid du brjod pa ni /
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'di la skad cig pa ma yin par smra ba gzhan dag ma nges pa nyid du brjod pa ni /
translated: In this regard, others who do not accept momentariness say that this reason is inconclusive.

original: ci ltar smra zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar smra zhe na /
translated: How do they say it?

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said that

original: med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin no //
translated: it is not nonexistent, that is, it is not nonexistent in terms of prior and subsequent.

original: dus gzhan du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dus gzhan du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: At another time means

original: bar gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i dus las dus gzhan te /
analyzed: bar gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i dus las dus gzhan te /
translated: at a time other than the time when it has the nature of the present.

original: 'das pa'am ma 'ongs pa der ro ;
analyzed: 'das pa'am ma 'ongs pa der ro ;
translated: It is past or future.

original: ; de ni snga phyi'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ; de ni snga phyi'i rang bzhin no //
translated: That is its prior and subsequent nature.

original: de'i tshe ni zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan du ni'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe ni zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan du ni'o //
translated: At that time means at another time.

original: ci ltar de'i tshe dmigs she na /
analyzed: ci ltar de'i tshe dmigs she na /
translated: How is it perceived at that time?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In this way means

original: gang du ni yul du'o //
analyzed: gang du ni yul du'o //
translated: where means in the object.

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ni mig la sogs pa'i tshogs pa'i nang du chud pa'i don to //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ni mig la sogs pa'i tshogs pa'i nang du chud pa'i don to //
translated: The characteristic of the object is the meaning included in the collection of eye and so on.

original: de dmigs pa mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dmigs pa mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the illustration of the object.

original: de'i dngos po ni dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid de don gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid de don gang yin pa'o //
translated: Its entity is the characteristic of the object, which is the meaning.

original: der ni nye bar dmigs so zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: der ni nye bar dmigs so zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is perceived there.

original: 'dig las she na /
analyzed: 'dig las she na /
translated: What is it?

original: bum pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bum pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is called a pot.

original: de 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa'o //
translated: Like that means it obtains the characteristic of the object.

original: don la brjod pa ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don la brjod pa ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression of the object is like that.

original: gang tshe zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o ;
analyzed: gang tshe zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o ;
translated: When means at another time.

original: ; gzhan gyi tshe zhes bya ba ni bar gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i dus na snga ma dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs par bya ba'i rang bzhin de 'dra ba nyid min pas so //
analyzed: ; gzhan gyi tshe zhes bya ba ni bar gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i dus na snga ma dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs par bya ba'i rang bzhin de 'dra ba nyid min pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe other time‚Äù means that at the time of the present, the natures of the past and future are not the same as the nature that is perceived.

original: gcig nyid na zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi rang bzhin dang snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus na yod pa'i rang bzhin du gcig na'o //
analyzed: gcig nyid na zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi rang bzhin dang snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus na yod pa'i rang bzhin du gcig na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it were the same‚Äù means that if the nature of the present and the nature that exists in the past and future were the same,

original: de dang de min te dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa dang ma gyur pa ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: de dang de min te dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa dang ma gyur pa ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: how could it be that it is and is not the characteristic of the perceived?

original: dmigs pa mtshan nyid du gyur pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dmigs pa mtshan nyid du gyur pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It would only be the characteristic of the perceived.

original: 'on te du ma nyid du khas len na /
analyzed: 'on te du ma nyid du khas len na /
translated: But if you accept that it is multiple,

original: de'i tshe de ltar rang bzhin sngar bzung ba de nyid phyis dmigs so zhes bya bar mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de'i tshe de ltar rang bzhin sngar bzung ba de nyid phyis dmigs so zhes bya bar mi 'thad de /
translated: then it is not tenable to say that ‚Äúthat very nature that was apprehended before is perceived later.‚Äù

original: gzhan kho na dmigs pa'i phyir @181a * //
analyzed: gzhan kho na dmigs pa'i phyir @181a * //
translated: Because it is only another that is perceived.

original: ro ; ; gal te da ltar gyi dus na snga phyi'i dus dag med pa'i phyir de na gnas pa'i rang bzhin med na de mi dmigs par 'thad pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: ro ; ; gal te da ltar gyi dus na snga phyi'i dus dag med pa'i phyir de na gnas pa'i rang bzhin med na de mi dmigs par 'thad pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: If the present time does not exist in the past and future times, then it does not have a nature that endures.

original: de ci ltar dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa kho nar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ci ltar dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa kho nar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How could it be that it is only the characteristic of perception?

original: gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy whom‚Äù refers to the present time.

original: de'i tshe ni da ltar gyi dus su'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe ni da ltar gyi dus su'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAt that time‚Äù refers to the present time.

original: 'o na ngas zhes bsnyad pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ngas zhes bsnyad pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúI‚Äù refers to the present time.

original: sngon dang zhes bya ba'o //üîΩde nyid brjod pa ni /
analyzed: sngon dang zhes bya ba'o // de nyid brjod pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúBefore‚Äù refers to the past time.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //üîΩ'o na dus gzhan ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o // 'o na dus gzhan ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúJust so‚Äù refers to the present time.

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //üîΩdngos po'i dus dang gcig yin na /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o // dngos po'i dus dang gcig yin na /
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù refers to the present time.üîΩIf the time of an entity is one,üîΩthen just as the entity is one,

original: de bzhin du dus kyang gcig nyid yin par 'gyur te /üîΩrtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du dus kyang gcig nyid yin par 'gyur te / rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: time would also be one.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni rtags pas na 'das pa dang da ltar gyi dus kyi dbye ba med pas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni rtags pas na 'das pa dang da ltar gyi dus kyi dbye ba med pas na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means because there is no distinction between past and present times.

original: gzhan gyi da ltar gyi gnas skabs na /
analyzed: gzhan gyi da ltar gyi gnas skabs na /
translated: ‚ÄúIn another‚Äôs present state‚Äù means in the present state of another.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs gnyis ma dmigs par brjod pa gang de med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs gnyis ma dmigs par brjod pa gang de med pa kho na'o //
translated: The statement that the two states of the past and future are not perceived is simply non-existent.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: dngos po de gnas na de yong na dus med par mi 'grub pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dngos po de gnas na de yong na dus med par mi 'grub pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because if the entity exists, the non-establishment of time is not tenable,

original: dngos po las dus tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po las dus tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because time is not different from the entity.

original: gzhan nyid la yang nyes pa brjod pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan nyid la yang nyes pa brjod pa ni /
translated: The error in difference is stated:

original: gzhan nyid yin na yang zhes bya'o //üîΩsnga ma dang phyi ma nyid rtogs pa spang par dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan nyid yin na yang zhes bya'o // snga ma dang phyi ma nyid rtogs pa spang par dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: If it is different,

original: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The anticipation of the objection that the understanding of prior and posterior is abandoned is stated:üîΩ‚ÄúBut if it is said that time exists in dependence on the entity,üîΩthen at that time,

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: the reversal is stated:

original: zlog pa ni dus nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: zlog pa ni dus nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTime itself does not exist.‚ÄùüîΩThe response is stated:

original: lan ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not so.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: dus ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dus ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause time is not different from the entity.‚Äù

original: khas blangs nas kyang sun 'byin pa ni /üîΩyang na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khas blangs nas kyang sun 'byin pa ni / yang na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The refutation after accepting the objection is stated:üîΩ‚ÄúBut if it is said that time exists in dependence on the entity,

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni /
translated: then at that time,

original: dus spyi'i don yin yang ngo /
analyzed: dus spyi'i don yin yang ngo /
translated: the meaning of time is general.‚Äù

original: de rtag pa nyid kyis snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos bor dmigs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de rtag pa nyid kyis snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos bor dmigs pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is permanent, it is observed as a prior and subsequent entity.

original: dus thams cad na yod pa'i rang bzhin kho nar dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus thams cad na yod pa'i rang bzhin kho nar dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is observed as a nature that exists at all times.

original: gal te khyad par can 'dzin pa ni khyad par 'dzin pa la ltos pa yin te des na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi cha khyad par rnams ma bzung na /
analyzed: gal te khyad par can 'dzin pa ni khyad par 'dzin pa la ltos pa yin te des na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi cha khyad par rnams ma bzung na /
translated: If you think that the apprehension of the qualified depends on the apprehension of the qualifier, and therefore, if the qualifiers of the past and future are not apprehended,

original: khyad par can dus kyi spyi yang mi 'dzin no zhes dogs par byed pa ni /
analyzed: khyad par can dus kyi spyi yang mi 'dzin no zhes dogs par byed pa ni /
translated: then the qualified, the universal of time, is not apprehended,

original: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then,

original: gzhan ni dus kyi cha'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni dus kyi cha'o //
translated: the other is the part of time.

original: snang ba'i dus kyi spyi'o //
analyzed: snang ba'i dus kyi spyi'o //
translated: The appearance is the universal of time.

original: 'on te mi snang ba'i dus kyi cha dang gcig yin pa des na mi dmigs so snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te mi snang ba'i dus kyi cha dang gcig yin pa des na mi dmigs so snyam na /
translated: If you think that it is not observed because it is one with the part of time that does not appear,

original: snang ba mi snang ba dang gcig nyid du skyes bu gang gis kyang ci ltar rtogs par nus te /
analyzed: snang ba mi snang ba dang gcig nyid du skyes bu gang gis kyang ci ltar rtogs par nus te /
translated: then how could anyone know that appearance is one with what does not appear?

original: de yang mi snang ba nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang mi snang ba nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it follows that it would not appear.

original: gal te de ltar gyi dus na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar gyi dus na /
translated: If that were so,

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i @181b dus dag rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i @181b dus dag rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: The past and future times are not cognized.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang 'brel ba can gyi dong zhan ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang 'brel ba can gyi dong zhan ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the object related to the past and future times is not seen.

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the response:

original: gzhan mthong ba med pa'i phyir snang ba'i mthong ba ci ltar zhes bya ba 'dis ni'o //üîΩgal te yang lhan cig spyod pa'i don gzhan mi mthong ba de lta na yang dus gsum du mthong ba'i dus nyid ces bya ba mi mthong bar ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan mthong ba med pa'i phyir snang ba'i mthong ba ci ltar zhes bya ba 'dis ni'o // gal te yang lhan cig spyod pa'i don gzhan mi mthong ba de lta na yang dus gsum du mthong ba'i dus nyid ces bya ba mi mthong bar ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: How can the seeing of light be the seeing of something else?üîΩEven if the object that accompanies it is not seen, how could the time of seeing the past and future not be seen?

original: 'on te dus gsum gsal byed yin pa'i phyir de ma bzung bar dus nyid ci ltar 'dzin snyam na snga ma dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te dus gsum gsal byed yin pa'i phyir de ma bzung bar dus nyid ci ltar 'dzin snyam na snga ma dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you think that time is not grasped because it is the clarifier of the three times, how is time grasped without grasping that?üîΩThe response is:

original: snga ma dang phyi ma na yod pa'i dus kyi skad cig gang yin pa des na dus nyid gsal bar bya bar mi 'thad de /
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma na yod pa'i dus kyi skad cig gang yin pa des na dus nyid gsal bar bya bar mi 'thad de /
translated: It is not tenable that time is clarified by the moments of time that exist in the past and future.üîΩBecause it is said:üîΩThat which exists as an entity

original: de ni gsal ba'am gsal min pa //üîΩngo bo nyid kyi gang gnas pa //
analyzed: de ni gsal ba'am gsal min pa //üîΩngo bo nyid kyi gang gnas pa //
translated: whether clarified or unclarified

original: rtag pa nyid phyir gso min pa //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid phyir gso min pa //
translated: because it is permanent, it is not healed.

original: de zad byed par nus pa gang //
analyzed: de zad byed par nus pa gang //
translated: What is able to exhaust it?

original: zhes brjod pa'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: zhes brjod pa'i tshul gyis so //
translated: In this way, it is said.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar dus zhes bya ba gzhan med pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar dus zhes bya ba gzhan med pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no other so-called time.

original: phyis zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i rang bzhin gyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: phyis zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i rang bzhin gyis kyang ngo //
translated: Later means by the nature of the future.

original: de ltar yin dang ci grub snyam na /
analyzed: de ltar yin dang ci grub snyam na /
translated: If it were like that, what would be established?

original: des zhes bya ba ste snang ba dang mi snang ba nyid med pas na'o //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ste snang ba dang mi snang ba nyid med pas na'o //
translated: By that means, because there is no appearance and non-appearance.

original: de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi gnas skabs nyid du'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi gnas skabs nyid du'o //
translated: At that very time means in the present state itself.üîΩObstruction is also not tenable in the momentary nature of perception.

original: dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyi skad cig la ni sgrib pa yang 'thad pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyi skad cig la ni sgrib pa yang 'thad pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: It is said:

original: bum pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bum pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The so-called vase.

original: de ltar sgrib pa la rtsol bar nye ba mi sbyor ba bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar sgrib pa la rtsol bar nye ba mi sbyor ba bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the non-application of effort towards obstruction in that way,

original: dbang po la nye bar mi sbyor ba bshad pa'i don du brjod pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po la nye bar mi sbyor ba bshad pa'i don du brjod pa ni /
translated: in order to explain the non-application towards the sense faculties, it is said:

original: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or else.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin nges pa dmigs par byed pa ma yin pas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin nges pa dmigs par byed pa ma yin pas na'o //
translated: Therefore means because the nature is not observed as ascertained.

original: nges par de ma thag pa'i rang bzhin da ltar ba'i rang bzhin nyid du dmigs pa zhes bya ba 'dir mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: nges par de ma thag pa'i rang bzhin da ltar ba'i rang bzhin nyid du dmigs pa zhes bya ba 'dir mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: It would not be that the nature of the present is ascertained as the nature of the immediate antecedent,

original: 'on kyang dus gsum na yod pa'i rang bzhin du dmigs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'on kyang dus gsum na yod pa'i rang bzhin du dmigs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: but rather that the nature that exists in the three times is observed. This is the meaning.

original: bzlog pa brjod pa ni /üîΩde ma thag pa nyid ces bya ba ste rtsol ba'i de ma thag kho nar mthong gi sngar ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bzlog pa brjod pa ni / de ma thag pa nyid ces bya ba ste rtsol ba'i de ma thag kho nar mthong gi sngar ni ma yin no //
translated: The opposite is stated:üîΩThe immediate antecedent is seen immediately after exertion, not before.

original: des na zhes bya ba brtsal ma thag kho nar mthong bas na /
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba brtsal ma thag kho nar mthong bas na /
translated: Therefore means because it is seen immediately after exertion.

original: don de ni de tsam du zhes bya ba rtsol ba'i de ma thag par yod pa tsam nyid kyi rang bzhin can yin no //
analyzed: don de ni de tsam du zhes bya ba rtsol ba'i de ma thag par yod pa tsam nyid kyi rang bzhin can yin no //
translated: That object has just that nature, which is the nature of existing merely immediately after exertion.

original: des na rtag pa la ni dbang po la phan btags pas so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin dmigs par bye dpa ma yin no zhes gnyug ma dang 'brel bar bya'o //
analyzed: des na rtag pa la ni dbang po la phan btags pas so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin dmigs par bye dpa ma yin no zhes gnyug ma dang 'brel bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, for the permanent, the nature is not observed as ascertained by the benefit to the faculty. This should be connected with the original.

original: ci'i phyir so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin dmigs par byed pa ma yin zhe na //
analyzed: ci'i phyir so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin dmigs par byed pa ma yin zhe na //
translated: Why is the nature of the object not ascertained?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //üîΩrtsol bas @182a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o // rtsol bas @182a * //
translated: It is like this.

original: legs par byas pa'i dbang po las kyang sgra mi rtag pa de nyid dmigs pa ma yin zhes 'og ma dang 'brel to //
analyzed: legs par byas pa'i dbang po las kyang sgra mi rtag pa de nyid dmigs pa ma yin zhes 'og ma dang 'brel to //
translated: Even when the sense faculty is well-constructed, the impermanence of sound is not ascertained.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de lta bur ces bya ba rtag pa'i rang bzhin du nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de lta bur ces bya ba rtag pa'i rang bzhin du nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is perceived as having such a nature, i.e., as permanent.

original: de ni rtag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rtag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is because it is permanent.

original: gal te dbang po logs par byas pa las rtag pa yang mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin nyid du dmigs par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dbang po logs par byas pa las rtag pa yang mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin nyid du dmigs par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: If the sense faculty is defective, is it not the case that permanence is perceived as having the nature of impermanence?

original: brjod pa logs par byas kyang sgra gang la mi rtag pa nyid gang zhig med pa'i mi rtag pa nyid de ni spra de la dmigs par 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod pa logs par byas kyang sgra gang la mi rtag pa nyid gang zhig med pa'i mi rtag pa nyid de ni spra de la dmigs par 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: Even when the expression is defective, the impermanence of sound, which is the absence of permanence, is not tenable as the object of that expression.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar rtag pa nyid dmigs pa de bas na dbang po la phan btags pas ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar rtag pa nyid dmigs pa de bas na dbang po la phan btags pas ni /
translated: Because such permanence is observed, therefore, the faculties are not benefited by the object.

original: so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin dmigs par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin dmigs par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Because permanence is observed in this way, therefore the nature of a specific entity is not made evident by benefiting the sense faculties.

original: 'o na rtag pa'i rang bzhin kho nar dmigs par 'gyur ro zhe na /üîΩrtag pa nyid ni yod mi 'gyur //
analyzed: 'o na rtag pa'i rang bzhin kho nar dmigs par 'gyur ro zhe na / rtag pa nyid ni yod mi 'gyur //
translated: But if permanence is observed, then it is just permanence that is observed.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If that is so, then permanence would not exist.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir nye bar dmigs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nye bar dmigs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it cannot be observed.

original: gal te ma dmigs kyang ci ltar med snyam na /
analyzed: gal te ma dmigs kyang ci ltar med snyam na /
translated: If it is asked how it is nonexistent if it is not observed,

original: dmigs pa nyid ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa nyid ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: it is said that observation itself.

original: yod pa nyid dmigs pa yin pas na /
analyzed: yod pa nyid dmigs pa yin pas na /
translated: Since existence is observation,

original: dmigs pa las gzhan pa'i yod pa ni dpyod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa las gzhan pa'i yod pa ni dpyod pa ma yin no //
translated: existence other than observation is not analyzed.

original: des na dmigs pa med na yod pa med pa'i phyir med pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na dmigs pa med na yod pa med pa'i phyir med pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, since there is no existence if there is no observation, it would be nonexistent.

original: nye bar dmigs pa mi nus pa'i zhes bya ba rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: nye bar dmigs pa mi nus pa'i zhes bya ba rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: The commentary on ‚Äúbecause it cannot be observed‚Äù is

original: rtag pa nyid yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúif it were permanent.‚Äù

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù is a hypothetical question.

original: ma dmigs su chug kyang zhes bya ba ni rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: ma dmigs su chug kyang zhes bya ba ni rtag pa nyid do //
translated: Even if it is not perceived, it is permanent.

original: lan ni dmigs pa'i zhes bya ba'o / gal te rtag pa nyid ni dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa ma yin pa des na de ci ltar dgag snyam na /
analyzed: lan ni dmigs pa'i zhes bya ba'o / gal te rtag pa nyid ni dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa ma yin pa des na de ci ltar dgag snyam na /
translated: The answer is: ‚ÄúThe perception of that.‚Äù If permanence is not the characteristic of perception, then how can it be refuted?

original: gal te zhes smos so //
analyzed: gal te zhes smos so //
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúHow?‚Äù

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni rtag pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni rtag pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the nature of permanence.

original: dmigs pa la ltos te skyed par byed pa nyid kyi gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa la ltos te skyed par byed pa nyid kyi gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ba ste /
translated: In dependence on perception, it is productive. That which exists in that way is said to be so.

original: gzhan gyi dmigs pa'i skyed byed du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dmigs pa'i skyed byed du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is accepted as the producer of the perception of another.

original: gal te de lta na yang ma dmigs pa nyid ci ltar yin snyam na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na yang ma dmigs pa nyid ci ltar yin snyam na /
translated: Even if it is so, how can it be non-perception?

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, it is said.

original: de'i rang bzhin la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because its nature is not the characteristic of perception.

original: dbang po logs par byas pa sun phyung nas /
analyzed: dbang po logs par byas pa sun phyung nas /
translated: Having refuted the impairment of the sense faculties,

original: sgra la logs par byed pa nyid sun 'byin pa ni sgra la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra la logs par byed pa nyid sun 'byin pa ni sgra la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the refutation of the impairment of sound is ‚ÄúSound is not impaired.‚Äù

original: sgra la rtsol bas phan btags par byas pa ni gzhan ma yin par khas blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: sgra la rtsol bas phan btags par byas pa ni gzhan ma yin par khas blang bar bya ste /
translated: It is not something else that is helped by effort.

original: de lta ma yin na sgra la sogs pa la rtsol bas ci yang mi byed par 'gyur @182b ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na sgra la sogs pa la rtsol bas ci yang mi byed par 'gyur @182b ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, effort would not do anything to sound, etc.

original: phyogs de la ni de nyid mi rtag pa nyid yin te de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i phan pa byas na /
analyzed: phyogs de la ni de nyid mi rtag pa nyid yin te de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i phan pa byas na /

original: de yang byas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang byas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni /

original: rtsol ba dbang po dang / sgrib pa sgra rnams la nye bar mi sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsol ba dbang po dang / sgrib pa sgra rnams la nye bar mi sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: effort does not apply to the faculties and obscurations with regard to sound, etc.

original: rtag pa ni 'gal zhig gi tshe 'bras bu mi bye dpar 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa ni 'gal zhig gi tshe 'bras bu mi bye dpar 'gal ba yin no //
translated: It is contradictory for a permanent thing to sometimes not produce a result.

original: rtag pa res 'ga' 'bras bu mi byed par 'gal ba de nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: rtag pa res 'ga' 'bras bu mi byed par 'gal ba de nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: Because it is contradictory for a permanent thing to sometimes not produce a result,

original: rtag pa las ldog pa'i shes pa 'di 'dra ba res 'ga' ba de ni /
analyzed: rtag pa las ldog pa'i shes pa 'di 'dra ba res 'ga' ba de ni /
translated: this kind of consciousness that is the opposite of permanent is sometimesüîΩ.

original: res 'ga' ba'i don gyi 'bras bur grub pas de'i rtags yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: res 'ga' ba'i don gyi 'bras bur grub pas de'i rtags yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: because it is established as the effect of the occasional, it is not the case that it is not ascertained.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs rtag pa dang / 'bras bu res 'ga' ba 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir brjod pa ni /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs rtag pa dang / 'bras bu res 'ga' ba 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir brjod pa ni /
translated: In order to demonstrate the contradiction between the permanent, which is the counter-correlate, and the occasional effect, he says:

original: sgra dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSound, etc.‚Äù

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni bum pa la sogs pa'i dpe'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni bum pa la sogs pa'i dpe'o //
translated: ‚ÄúMoreover‚Äù is an example such as a pot.

original: de kho na ltar zhes bya ba ni khyab pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: de kho na ltar zhes bya ba ni khyab pa nyid du'o //

analyzed: shes pa res 'ga' bar ci ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /

original: de ni zhes bya ba ste sgra la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ste sgra la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù is sound, etc.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù is

original: rtag pa dang 'bras bu res 'ga' ba 'gal ba med par dogs pa ni /
analyzed: rtag pa dang 'bras bu res 'ga' ba 'gal ba med par dogs pa ni /
translated: The doubt that the permanent and the occasional effect are not contradictory is

analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni res 'ga' dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni res 'ga' dmigs pa'o //
